com.turnout.ws.controller

Class StudioPartyActivityController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.turnout.ws.controller.StudioPartyActivityController

  • @Component
@Path(value="/")
public class StudioPartyActivityController
extends java.lang.Object
    StudioPartyActivityController class is front face for accessing and manipulating resources in combination with studios activity and party.Class and all of its method is mapped with URI path template to which the resource responds. This class is registered with jersey resource configuration, So user can access it and its method by specified URI path template. All operations related to person and activities(events and challenges) are implemented here like adding party into interested event list and accepting challenges and list of badges a party has won. .

    • Method Detail

      • addInterestedPartyToEvent

        @RolesAllowed(value="USER")
@POST
@Path(value="/addInterestedPartyToEvent")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject addInterestedPartyToEvent(org.json.simple.JSONObject createreq)
                                                     throws PartyNotFoundException
        This method allows to show a party who are interested in given event. So he can get latest notification about that event.
        Parameters:
        createreq - A JSONObject contains value of party, studio id and it's event.
        Returns:
        Returns success message with inserted row id.
        Throws:
        PartyNotFoundException - It throws when entered party id is not found in the database.

      • userCheckin

        @RolesAllowed(value="USER")
@POST
@Path(value="/partyCheckin")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject userCheckin(org.json.simple.JSONObject checkinreq)
                                       throws java.text.ParseException
        Beacons will call this method when party check in any studio to register their entry.
        Parameters:
        checkinreq - A JSONObject contains value of party id, beacon id and it's time.
        Returns:
        Returns success message of insertion.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - It throws when unexpected error happened while parsing text.

        staid - A challenge's id on which participants search will take place.

      • selectWinner

        @RolesAllowed(value="ADMIN")
@POST
@Path(value="/selectWinner")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject selectWinner(org.json.simple.JSONObject checkinreq)
                                        throws java.text.ParseException,
                                               PartyNotFoundException
        This function used for selecting winners from list of participants who are all finished their challenge.
        Parameters:
        checkinreq - It contains all the details of winner. So it can be updated into database.
        Returns:
        Returns Challenge's id on which new winner has been selected.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - It throws when unexpected error happened while parsing text
        PartyNotFoundException - It throws when entered party id is not found in the database.
